model

Class Hobbit

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Hobbit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PersonType, Simpleton

    public class Hobbit
extends java.lang.Object
implements Simpleton, PersonType
    Hobbit implements the Simpleton and PersonType interfaces. A Hobbit is a simpleton with the ability to do math, say something smart about a subject, and pick carrots.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String carrotsPicked
      String containing the number of carrots the hobbit picked

      String containing an example of the type of math the person can do
      private java.lang.String name
      String containing the person's name
      private java.lang.String phrase
      String containing a phrase about something the person is knowledgeable about
